cause.description:
I CREATED THIS CAUSE PAGE SIMPLY IN THE HOPES OF EDUCATING ANYONE WHO MAY HAVE ABORTION ON THEIR LIST OF OPTIONS FOR THEIR UNBORN CHILD. I WILL ANSWER ANY AND ALL QUESTION REGARDING ABORTION I AM BY NO STREACH OF THE IMAGINATION AN EXPERT BUT I HAVE DONE ALOT OF STUDYING ON THE TOPIC. SO IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS YOU CAN MESSAGE ME ON MY PAGE AND I WILL ANSWER THEM AND PROMISE THAT NOTHING THAT IS SAID BETWEEN US WILL BE REPEATED BY ME TO ANYONE ELSE!!
GET THE FACTS FIRS!!!
1. Abortion is the killing of one life so that anoter is not inconvienced!
2. ABORTION IS WRONG
cause.mission: EDUCATE EVERYONE WORLD WIDE OF THE HORRORS OF ABORTION!
cause.name: YAAA ( YOUNG ADULTS AGAINST ABORTION)
